name: Food on the floor
description:
Food is OK to eat if you pick it up in 10 seconds or less.

Did you heard about the 10 second rule ? If food is falling on the floor, you have a 10 second window to pick it up. Or … You need to cook some recipes by putting ingredients inside correct cooking devices (Oven, Mixer or Freezer) and throw them to the hungry alien outside.

/!\ You Need a VR headset (tested witch Oculus Quest 2) and VR controllers /!\ Controls
  • Navigate the room using your feets, you can use the secondary button on the right VR controller to center the view.
  • Grab button on both controllers to grab objects around you
Team
  • Eva Barenton - 3D / Game Design / Level Design / Sounds
  • Grégoire Delzongle - Game Design / Code
